title: Ticket #4013: update param_info.in to match the generic config file
description:
As much as possible, defaults from condor_config.generic should be moved into the default parameter table that is defined in param_info.in

This will save memory, since params defined in param_info.in are shared between processes in the code segment, while params read from the config file are stored in the heap.

This will also enable a HTCondor config with only a few lines in the config file.
